# Main

## Person: {props.name1}

## Company: {props.company1}

### Address {props.address1.street}, {props.address1.city}

## Company: {props.company2}

### Address {props.address2.street}, {props.address2.city}

## Company: {reverse(props.company3)}

### Address {props.address3.street}, {props.address3.city}
